body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Sweet Delights Bakery. My name is Kenneth Johnson. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Kenneth, my name is Denise Adams. I recently had an issue with your customer service and I'm quite disappointed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Denise. Could you please provide me with more details about the issue you experienced?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I placed an order for a birthday cake, but it arrived late and the decoration was not what I requested.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Denise. May I have the order number, spelled out please, and the date of the order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The order number is two three four five and the date was October ninth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Denise. Let me look into this for you. Could you also provide me with your email address so that I can follow up with you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is denise.adams@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Denise. I will investigate this issue and get back to you as soon as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I just hope this can be resolved soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Denise. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We appreciate your patience and will do our best to resolve this promptly. Have a great day!
